name: MixedNUTS: Training-Free Accuracy-Robustness Balance via Nonlinearly Mixed Classifiers
authors: Yatong Bai, Mo Zhou, Vishal M. Patel, Somayeh Sojoudi
footnote: It uses an ensemble of networks. The accurate base classifier was pre-trained on ImageNet-21k. 58.50% robust accuracy is due to the original evaluation (Adaptive AutoAttack)
